# b2b-grid-row



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                           | Type                                                                                  | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignItems` | `align-items` | Vertical alignment of columns. This requires the row to have a defined height.                        | `"center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "stretch"`                                 | `'stretch'` |
| `columnGap`  | `column-gap`  | The spacing in between individual columns in px. The higher the gap, the smaller the columns will be. | `number`                                                                              | `24`        |
| `justify`    | `justify`     | Horizontal alignment of columns.                                                                      | `"center" \| "end" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "space-evenly" \| "start"` | `'start'`   |
| `rowGap`     | `row-gap`     | The spacing between individual rows in px.                                                            | `number`                                                                              | `24`        |
